narrative:
No-non complaint items noted this inspection.  
Applicant wants to be licensed as a class A breeder.
Please issue a class A license.
License fee will be sent by the applicant to:
USDA, APHIS, AC, ERO
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27605
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
Inspection and Exit briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
Additional Inspectors
Campitelli D.V.M Kathryn, Veterinary Medical Officer
